org.jdesktop.core.animation.rendering

Interface JRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JActiveRenderer, JPassiveRenderer

    public interface JRenderer
    Defines the public interface to a renderer implementation.
    Author:
    Tim Halloran
    See Also:
    JRendererTarget

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getAverageCycleTimeNanos()
      Calculates the total average time for each rendering cycle.
      long getFPS()
      Calculates the frames per second being drawn to the screen.
      TimingSource getTimingSource()
      Gets the timing source being used by the renderer.
      void invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable task)
      Submits a task to be run by the renderer in the same thread context that its JRendererTarget uses.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down rendering.

    • Method Detail

      • invokeLater

        void invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Submits a task to be run by the renderer in the same thread context that its JRendererTarget uses.

        Safe to be called at any time within any thread.

        Parameters:
        task - a task for the renderer.

      • getTimingSource

        TimingSource getTimingSource()
        Gets the timing source being used by the renderer.
        Returns:
        the timing source being used by the renderer.

      • getFPS

        long getFPS()
        Calculates the frames per second being drawn to the screen.

        Safe to be called at any time within any thread.

        Returns:
        the frames per second being drawn to the screen.

      • getAverageCycleTimeNanos

        long getAverageCycleTimeNanos()
        Calculates the total average time for each rendering cycle.

        Safe to be called at any time within any thread.

        Returns:
        average time in nanoseconds.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shuts down rendering.

        Safe to be called at any time within any thread.
